  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/1019</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/1019</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">S'ha de fer sempre el mínim comú denominador per sumar fraccions?</string>
            <string language="en">Must you always find the lowest common denominator when adding fractions?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Müssen Sie den kleinsten gemeinsamen Nenner immer
finden, wenn Sie Brüche hinzufügen?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Devez-vous toujours trouver le plus bas 
dénominateur commun en ajoutant des fractions ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Deve você sempre encontrar o denominador comum o 
mais baixo ao adicionar frações?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dovete trovare sempre il denominatore comune più 
basso quando aggiunge le frazioni?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρέπει να βρείτε πάντα το χαμηλότερο κοινό 
παρονομαστή κατά την προσθήκη των μερών;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) sobre la necessitat de calcular el comú denominador per fer la suma de fraccions. Conté un enllaç per ampliar la informació a la MUD "El cuiner i la suma de fraccions".</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) on the need to find the lowest common denominator when adding fractions. It includes a link to the interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) "The chef and adding fractions" for further information.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">àlgebra</string>
            <string language="en">algebra</string>
            <string language="es">álgebra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">càlcul</string>
            <string language="en">calculus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">matemàtiques</string>
            <string language="en">mathematics</string>
            <string language="es">matemáticas</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie (GLEICHHEIT) auf der 
Notwendigkeit, den kleinsten gemeinsamen Nenner zu finden, wenn Sie 
Brüche hinzufügen. Er schließt ein Link zur interaktiven 
unterrichtenden Minimaßeinheit (SCHLAMM)"der Chef und 
Hinzufügenbrüche" für weitere Informationen ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez (PAIR) sur la nécessité de 
trouver le plus bas dénominateur commun en ajoutant des fractions. 
Il inclut un lien à la mini unité d'enseignement interactive 
(BOUE)"le chef et des fractions d'ajouter" pour de plus amples 
informations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda (PAR) na necessidade encontrar o 
denominador comum o mais baixo ao adicionar frações. Inclui 
uma ligação à unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA)"o chef e 
frações da adição" para uma informação mais adicional.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a (PAR) sulla necessità di trovare il 
denominatore comune più basso quando aggiungono le frazioni. 
Include un collegamento alla mini unità d'istruzione 
interattiva (FANGO)"il chef e frazioni di aggiunta" per ulteriori 
informazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) στην ανάγκη να βρεθεί ο 
χαμηλότερος κοινός παρονομαστής κατά το προσθήκη των μερών. 
Περιλαμβάνει μια σύνδεση με τη διαλογική μίνι μονάδα 
διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ)"ο αρχιμάγειρας και προσθήκη των μερών" για 
περισσότερες πληροφορίες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Algebra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalkül</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">algèbre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">calcul</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mathématiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">álgebra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cálculo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">matemática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">algebra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">calcolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">matematica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άλγεβρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υπολογισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαθηματικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
